job.title: Machine Learning Engineer/Prototyper
job.description: pstrongDescriptionstrongppMachine Learning Engineer and Prototyper We need engineers who are comfortable with preproduction work rather than working on existing systemsppnbspppstrongDescriptionstrongppWe are looking for anbspstrongmachine learning engineer with a focus on rapid prototyping and preproduction development to build innovative solutions for the Productivity teamstrong The ML Engineer will become an integral part of the Productivity and D10X team Our teams work with businesses to solve hard problems that require experimentation an outsidein perspective and experience navigating ambiguityppnbspppstrongJob BackgroundcontextstrongppbrppThe objective of the job is to create experiment and put in place rapid prototypes and initial MVPs where solution hypothesis generation and testing is done with tangible throwaway proofsofconcept and rapidly implemented solutions We expect that much of the work will requirenbspstrongan application of machine learning aimed at process automation but will likely also involve elements of data engineering backend development and processsystems mapping and designstrongppbrppYou should be a jack of all trades with a wellrounded set of programming skills and data sciencedata engineering knowledge with experience in preproduction development You should have an interest in understanding why a software feature has business value  and want to know the customer journey that is being addressed to ensure you are building the right thing in the right way Versatility is key as every project will require a different approach sometimes including nontechnical work like process mapping or data gatheringppnbspppThis job will require a high degree of independence curiosity initiative and comfort with good enough over perfection It will also require a huge amount of extroverted communications with other parts of Client If you have to be told what to do on a daily basis if you dont like sharing your work early or if you are not comfortable in developing relationships in a large organization then this job is not for youppnbspppstrongKey ResponsibilitiesstrongppbrppPrimarily youll be developing prototypes and initial MVPs for functions like risk finance compliance and HRppbrppstrongTechnical SkillsstrongppnbspstrongRapid prototyping experiencestrongppnbspstrongComfort with ML concepts and tools including Pythonstrongpp Comfort with data manipulation and data engineeringpp Basic backend development skills PHP Javapp Experience with APIs REST and microservicespp Experience with rational databasespp Knowledge of code versioningpp Comfort with systems mapping and communicating about process and data flowsppnbspppstrongOther Considerationsstrongpp Technical degreepp Basic frontend development skills HTML CSS JavaScript Angular Flutter React a plus but not requiredpp Experience with early stage new product developmentpp Excellent communication skillspp Ability to work with minimal supervisionpp Willing to collaborate with teams in diverse locationspp Problem solving skills demonstrated by past positionspp Ability to work under tight deadlines and handle multiple tasks in changing environmentpp Experience working at fintech startups or corporate innovation teams is a plusp
